name: Rock Defender
description:
Tired of lining up candies in the country of the lollipop? Blow up enemies to the rithm of rock and roll....an begin your way to the Rock Valhalla!

Become a Rock Defender, Ouh Yeah!

Defend your stage from hordes of zombie monsters! Grab your magic guitar and start to spread death. Don't leave chicken with head! Your enemies have been summoned from hell to kill rock and roll, and will not stop never.

Choose your arsenal and freeze them, burn them, electrocute them, poison them .... Multiple weapons to choose. Do not attack them with a dusty ukulele ... .Improve all your weapons and defenses, and add deadly effects.

If you download this game you will enjoy, laugh, cry, dance, you will be cool .... Join the army of manes in the wind!

100% REAL FREE Game! Really, try it! Features
  • TOWER DEFENSE - ACTION GAME
    Enjoy with a mix of best genres for a mobile video game. Defend your stage killing a lot of enemies, but you must be smart to choose your weapons. Choosed strategy is very important.
  • TERRIFFICLY FUNNY MONSTERS!
    Face enemies with different features: big, small, fast, slow, strong, weak, and others ...way too smart! Enjoy this zombie grind fest!
  • WIN COINS AND DIAMONDS AND IMPROVE YOUR EQUIPMENT!
    Get coins and diamonds in every level to upgrade your defenses and weapons. Incorporate cannons and defensive spears to protect your stage, improve your weapons...your guitar will be a deadly axe!
  • DREADFUL BOSS BATTLES!
    Fight against exceptionally resistant, mischievous and smart enemies. Find out their weak spots and kill them. Will you be able to surpass them?
  • GET ALL COLLECTIBLES
    Kill bosses to get all collectibles.
  • SURVIVE TO HORDE MODE!
    How long will you endure the hordes of evil? Climb to the top of the ranking!
  • OVERCOME CHALLENGES!
    Play daily quests and unlock the challenges that we have prepared for you. How many achievements will you be able to get? More than yout friends?
  • FIGHT AGAINST ELEMENTS!
    Does the rain make you afraid? and the snow? And hurricanes? Careful, maybe it will curl your hair ...
  • ENJOY ROCK AND HEAVY METAL SONGS!
    Will motivate you to kill more and more...
  • And much more...stop reading, and download it now!
LET'S ROCK! \m/

Download from Gooole Play
